name: [GMTK 2020] To Work With Your Own Hands
name_original: [GMTK 2020] To Work With Your Own Hands
description:
To Work With Your Own Hands

A story about a farmer living in a rapidly-changing world, and the adversity he must overcome as a result of it.

A tile-based 8-bit puzzle game about elemental mechanics like fire & water, as well as time.
